snippet: Aaron Rodgers threw a 61-yard touchdown pass to tight end Richard Rodgers with no time left to give the Packers a 27-23 victory in Detroit.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Green Bay Packers defeat Detroit Lions, 27-23; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Aaron Rodgers threw a 61-yard touchdown pass to tight end Richard Rodgers with no time left to give the Packers a 27-23 victory in Detroit.

headline.print_headline: Packers Stun Lions on a Rodgers-to-Rodgers Hail Mary
headline.main: Packers Stun Lions on a Rodgers-to-Rodgers Hail Mary
